profile.name: ISO 19005-2:2011 - 6.2.4 Colour Spaces - 6.2.4.4 Separation and DeviceN colour spaces - DeviceN colorants
profile.description: For any spot colour used in a DeviceN or NChannel colour space, an entry in the Colorants dictionary shall be present.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: For any spot colour used in a DeviceN or NChannel colour space, an entry in the Colorants dictionary shall be present.

error.message: A colorant of the DeviceN color space is not defined in the Colorants dictionary
